CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 物质；事情；问题；课题；麻烦；案件；事件；情况；内容；材料；文稿；资料；印刷品；（某种）东西；物品；材料；物料；事态；实质；要点
重要；有关系；有影响；要紧；有重要性；有重大影响

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 婚姻的；与婚姻有关的；根据结婚的惯例的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 含义不很具体，暗示人们考虑和关心的事和话题。
多指意见能达到一致的问题，着重争论或讨论中的问题。
指客观上存在的、难以处理或难以理解的问题。
通常指用口头或书面提出来要求回答或有待讨论解决的问题。
多指某一种形式的物质，既可指元素也可指化合物。
多用于日常生活中，非正式用词。常指构成整体的所有部分、物体或项目。有时指劣等材料，含轻蔑意味。
通常指构成实物的物质，与精神相对立。在科学上，指占有空间，并能以某种方式被感官觉察的一切东西。
通常指组成客观存在物的部分或其原料。
含义较广，侧重指已发生或必须去做的任何事情或事务。复数形式多指重大或较复杂的事务。
普通用词，着重指一件考虑中的或需要处理的事。
往往强调与个人或团体利害有直接或重大关系的事。
通常指较重要或较难而又必须承担的事情，也可指商事。
用作“事情”解时，词义较笼统、含糊，多用于指不很具体的事。

word_group.brief_definition: 没关系, 不要紧, 不重要
不管怎样；无论怎样；无论如何
不超过；事关；关系到；取决于
事实；实际情况；事实问题

word_group.phrase: a matter of life or death

word_group.brief_definition: 就此而论, 在这方面
生死攸关的事, 成败的关键
word_group.phrase: a matter of life and death

bilingual.source: She helped you to work out the answers yourself no matter how difficult they were.
bilingual.target: 她帮助你自己解决问题，不管它们有多难。
允许我们进一步讨论这个问题。

bilingual.source: Is something the matter with your computer?
She chose to stay silent on the matter.
bilingual.target: 她对这个问题选择了沉默。
这个问题超出了我的管辖权。
在这个问题上我们的意见一致。

bilingual.source: The matter was discussed at the meeting.
bilingual.target: 这个问题在会议上被讨论了。

bilingual.source: In nature, it is just a matter of time.
bilingual.target: 本质上，这只是一个时间问题。

bilingual.source: At the bottom, it is a matter of trust.
bilingual.target: 根本上，这是一个信任的问题。

list.abstract: matter，英文单词，本义是指问题，情况，物质，物品，材料。

yingyinNormal.en: It's just a matter of whether we want to address it now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 问题是我们要不要现在谈这个。

yingyinNormal.en: If I don't publish it, it's just a matter of time before someone else does.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就算我不发表，别人也会发现的，只是时间问题。

yingyinNormal.en: Uh, just one other matter. I want to talk about taxation of Internet commerce.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有一件事，我想谈谈互联网商务的税收问题。

yingyinNormal.en: It's only a matter of time before I snapped again. I'm not in control.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我早晚会再袭击你们，只是时间的问题，我控制不了自己。

yingyinNormal.en: What's the matter? Is something wrong? Do you have to stay? American Express?
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么了？有什么问题吗？你得留下来吗？美国运通？

yingyinNormal.en: No matter the policy question, foreign or domestic, we hammer Dunbar's lack of experience.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不论是政策，国际或国内问题，我们都抨击邓巴经验不足。

yingyinNormal.en: It's only a matter of time before someone else sees this investment. We have to act now!
yingyinNormal.zh: 其他人发现这个投资机会只是时间问题，我们现在就需要行动。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Reese is handling one now. I'm sure he'll be fine on his own until we get this matter sorted out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 里瑟先生现在正在处理，我相信他没事的，能撑到我们解决问题。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm not saying that my opinion won't change on this matter, and, of course, I'm always open to dialogue.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不是说在这个问题上我的观点不会变了，当然，我接受对话。

yingyinNormal.en: Sure, most of the leaders in every industry were men, but we thought changing that was just a matter of time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，大部分行业的领袖都是男性。但改变应该只是时间问题。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: Now, back to the matter in hand. Coffin. Problem, someone is about to die. It will be, as I understand it, a tragedy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 回到正题。棺材。问题，有人要死了。就我所知，这会是个悲剧。

yingyinNormal.en: Honey, it's not just a matter of where you put it. I mean a baby changes everything. They cry all the time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 亲爱的，问题不只是要把它放在哪里，宝宝会改变你全部的生活，它们总是哭个不停。

yingyinNormal.en: If he doesn't listen, take one or two others along so that every matter may be established by the testimony of two or three witnesses.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果他不听，便带上其他一二人，那么每个确定的问题都有两三位证人的证词。

yingyinNormal.en: What's the matter, Auggie? Is no one believing that the little kid could possibly have an idea about how we could raise our older child?
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么事情，奥吉？难道有人会相信你个小毛孩还能解决我们怎么养这位大孩子的问题吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Our priority must be to stop the gate from opening. Fail there, and it's just a matter of time before they beat us with sheer numbers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们必须优先阻止传送门打开，如果那里失败，在他们以绝对数量击败我们之前只是一个时间问题了。

yingyinNormal.en: Said forensics had Margot's hard drive. And told the law enforcement team we'd already cleared the zone I knew her body was in. But still, it was only a matter of time before they'd found the spot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 骗他说鉴证科有玛戈的硬盘。然后告诉执法队我们排除了那片有她尸体的区域的嫌疑。但找到她，只是时间问题。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, technically, the Supreme Court wouldn't determine a defendant's guilt or innocence in a criminal matter. They could only reverse or revamp a jury's conviction based on a constitutional or statutory issue.
yingyinNormal.zh: 严格来说，最高法院并不会裁定一名被告在一起刑事案件中是有罪还是无罪。它们只能把一个法官的判决根据宪法或法规上的问题进行驳回或改进。

yingyinNormal.en: How could it not matter?
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么可能不会怎样？

yingyinNormal.en: What's the matter with you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你到底是怎么了?

yingyinNormal.en: It doesn't matter. I'm home.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这不重要，我回来了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 事情; 问题; 状况

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 不管怎样；无论怎样；无论如何

sense_info_list.en: an affair or situation under consideration
sense_info_list.zh: 事情; 问题; 状况

examination_example.sentence: Exactly when that day will be is a <highlight>matter</highlight> of debate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一天究竟会在什么时候到来还有待商榷。

examination_example.sentence: Obesity is probably less a <highlight>matter</highlight> of weight than body fat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 肥胖可能不是体重的问题，而是身体脂肪的问题。

examination_example.sentence: Illiberal Education and "The Heart of the <highlight>Matter</highlight>"
examination_example.sentence_trans: 非自由教育与“问题的核心”

sense_info_list.en: be of importance; have significance

examination_example.sentence: What <highlight>matters</highlight> is that they will belong to a private monopoly which developed them using public resources.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 重要的是，它们将属于一个利用公共资源开发它们的私人垄断企业。

examination_example.sentence: It measures things that do not <highlight>matter</highlight> and misses things that do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它衡量的是无关紧要的事情，而忽略了重要的事情。

examination_example.sentence: The words that have <highlight>mattered</highlight> are efficiency, flexibility, shareholder value, business-friendly, wealth generation, sales, impact and, in newspapers, circulation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最重要的词语是效率、灵活性、股东价值、商业友好、财富创造、销售、影响力，以及在报纸上的发行量。

examination_example.sentence: No <highlight>matter</highlight> how formal or informal the work environment, the way you present yourself has an impact.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论工作环境是正式还是非正式，你表现自己的方式都会产生影响。

examination_example.sentence: No <highlight>matter</highlight> how isolated you might feel and how serious the situation is, you should always remember that you are not alone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论你感到多么孤立无援，无论情况多么严峻，你都应该永远记住，你并不孤单。

examination_example.sentence: After all, the corporations are evading promotion of women to top positions — no <highlight>matter</highlight> how much "soft pressure" is put upon them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毕竟，无论施加多大的“软压力”，企业都在回避提拔女性担任高层职位。

sense_info_list.en: used in expressions describing how small an amount or period of time is
the reason for distress or a problem
physical substance in the universe
the present situation or state of affairs
(of a wound) secrete or discharge pus

word_usage.usage: matter作动词指“某事或某人事关紧要；要紧；有重大影响”时，不用于进行时。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 不超过；事关；关系到；取决于

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: be of importance; have significance

examination_example.sentence: I'm robbing myself of the energy to focus on the things that <highlight>matter</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我剥夺了自己关注重要事情的精力。

examination_example.sentence: Medical predictability can rarely be based on DNA alone; the environment <highlight>matters</highlight> too.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 医学上的可预测性很少能仅仅基于DNA；环境也很重要。

examination_example.sentence: Extant conditions also <highlight>matter</highlight> in terms of when and how often we lie.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 外部条件也影响着我们何时说谎以及说谎的频率。

examination_example.sentence: If we're talking about the benefits to society, the only thing that <highlight>matters</highlight> is what the major enables students to produce for society.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们谈论的是对社会的益处，唯一重要的就是专业能让学生为社会创造什么。

sense_info_list.en: an affair or situation under consideration

examination_example.sentence: But for more important <highlight>matters</highlight>, I think gut instinct might be overrated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但对于更重要的事情，我认为直觉可能被高估了。

examination_example.sentence: The optimism and positivity may motivate people to focus less on trivial and unimportant <highlight>matters</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 乐观和积极可以激励人们少关注琐碎和不重要的事情。

examination_example.sentence: This discrepancy between state and private education is a <highlight>matter</highlight> of social justice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公立教育和私立教育之间的这种差异事关社会公正。

sense_info_list.en: physical substance in the universe
the reason for distress or a problem

examination_example.sentence: Some species use their sense of hearing more than their eyes as a <highlight>matter</highlight> of adaptation to a particular lifestyle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些物种更多地利用听觉而不是视觉来适应特定的生活方式。

sense_info_list.en: the present situation or state of affairs
used in expressions describing how small an amount or period of time is

word_usage.usage:
the matter指“麻烦事，困难”，在句中可用作表语或后置定语，不用作主语。
问题是车内没有位置容纳你，所以我们无法带你一起去。
误 The matter is that we won't have enough room in the car to take you with us.
正 The problem is that we won't have enough room in the car to take you with us.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指木材、石头、金属、塑料等用于制作某物的原材料; 也可指文学创作的素材。
通常指构成实物的物质, 指一切有形物质的总称。在哲学上, 与意识相对立。在科学上, 指占有空间, 并能以某种方式被感官觉察的一切东西。
含义较广, 侧重指已发生或必须去做的任何事情或事务。复数形式多指重大或较复杂的事务。
通常指较重要或较难而又必须承担的事情, 也可指商事。
往往强调与个人或团体利害有直接或重大关系的事。
普通用词, 着重指一件考虑中的或需要处理的事。
多指意见能达到一致的问题, 着重争论或讨论中的问题。
含义不很具体, 暗示人们考虑和关心的事和话题。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: be of importance; have significance

examination_example.sentence: This should <highlight>matter</highlight> a great deal to parents, teachers and policymakers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这对家长、老师和政策制定者来说应该非常重要。

examination_example.sentence: A review of 54 studies found that there is no consensus yet on what type of breakfast is healthier, and concluded that the type of breakfast doesn't <highlight>matter</highlight> as much as simply eating something.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一篇对54项研究的文献综合分析发现，对于哪种类型的早餐更健康，人们还没有达成共识，并且该论文认为，早餐的类型，远不如吃早餐这件事本身来得重要。

examination_example.sentence: The overall number of bacteria on the surface <highlight>mattered</highlight> more, and this decreased over time after the initial introduction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 表面的细菌总数更重要，而且在最初引入后，随着时间的推移，细菌数量会减少。

sense_info_list.en: an affair or situation under consideration

examination_example.sentence: That's a different <highlight>matter</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那是另外一回事。

examination_example.sentence: We advise businesses on all <highlight>matters</highlight>, from market analysis to legal issues, anything a business like yours could need.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们为企业提供从市场分析到法律问题的所有建议，像您这样的企业可能需要的任何东西。

examination_example.sentence: But both studies show that long life isn't just a <highlight>matter</highlight> of your physical health but of your mental health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但这两项研究都表明，长寿不仅与你的身体健康有关，还与你的心理健康有关。

sense_info_list.en: physical substance in the universe
the reason for distress or a problem

examination_example.sentence: It's usually a <highlight>matter</highlight> of individuality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通常是个性问题。

examination_example.sentence: You'll find depth that you won't get from your screen no <highlight>matter</highlight> how many likes you get on your post.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你会发现无论你的帖子得到多少个赞，你都无法从你的屏幕上获得深度。

examination_example.sentence: According to a pediatrician, no <highlight>matter</highlight> what kind of play children engage in, they are learning how to create things.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据一位儿科医生说，不管孩子玩什么游戏，他们都在学习如何创造东西。

examination_example.sentence: No <highlight>matter</highlight> how it happened, millions of Americans are putting their health, quality of life and even length of life in danger.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论它是如何发生的，数以百万计的美国人正将他们的健康、生活质量甚至寿命置于危险之中。

sense_info_list.en: used in expressions describing how small an amount or period of time is

examination_example.sentence: It's possible to drive in a <highlight>matter</highlight> of minutes from sleek (光亮的) office towers near the airport to a Vietnamese mall.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在几分钟内从机场附近光亮的办公大楼到一个越南购物商场是有可能实现的。

sense_info_list.en: the present situation or state of affairs

examination_example.sentence: As a <highlight>matter</highlight> of fact, consumers expressed higher satisfaction with the one-star facilities, the lowest rated, than with the five-star ones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，消费者对评级最低的一星级设施的满意度高于五星级设施。

word_usage.usage:
the matter指“麻烦事，困难”，在句中可用作表语或后置定语，不用作主语。
问题是车内没有位置容纳你，所以我们无法带你一起去。
误 The matter is that we won't have enough room in the car to take you with us.
正 The problem is that we won't have enough room in the car to take you with us.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指木材、石头、金属、塑料等用于制作某物的原材料; 也可指文学创作的素材。
通常指构成实物的物质，指一切有形物质的总称。在哲学上，与意识相对立。在科学上，指占有空间，并能以某种方式被感官觉察的一切东西。
含义较广，侧重指已发生或必须去做的任何事情或事务。复数形式多指重大或较复杂的事务。
通常指较重要或较难而又必须承担的事情，也可指商事。
往往强调与个人或团体利害有直接或重大关系的事。
普通用词，着重指一件考虑中的或需要处理的事。
多指意见能达到一致的问题，着重争论或讨论中的问题。
含义不很具体，暗示人们考虑和关心的事和话题。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (matter of fact)不动感情的; 据实的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 不管怎样；无论怎样；无论如何
事实；实际情况；事实问题

examination_example.sentence: We should move on no <highlight>matter</highlight> what happens.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不管发生什么，我们都应该继续前进。

examination_example.sentence: Unlike friendships that can fade or break, I know I'll always be connected to my mother no <highlight>matter</highlight> what I face.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与可能褪色或破裂的友谊不同，我知道无论我面临什么，我都将永远与母亲联系在一起。

examination_example.sentence: Stick to your set bedtime and wake-up time, no <highlight>matter</highlight> the day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 坚持你设定的就寝时间和起床时间，不管是哪一天。

examination_example.sentence: You are more likely to distinguish between what <highlight>matters</highlight> and what does not.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你更有可能区分什么重要，什么不重要。

examination_example.sentence: If the only reading you ever do is the novel or magazine, the speed at which you read-probably does not <highlight>matter</highlight> very much.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你唯一的阅读量就是看小说和杂志，那么阅读速度就不那么重要了。

examination_example.sentence: It's our experience of the garden that <highlight>matters</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 重要的是我们对花园的体验。

examination_example.sentence: It is not a problem *whether* we can win the battle; it's just a <highlight>matter</highlight> of time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们能不能打赢这场战斗不是问题；只是时间问题。

examination_example.sentence: Asking a favor of the President of the United States was no casual <highlight>matter</highlight>, especially for a seventeen-year-old girl.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 向美国总统请求帮助不是一件随便的事，尤其是对一个17岁的女孩来说。

examination_example.sentence: If someone knocks and it's not an important <highlight>matter</highlight>, excuse yourself and let the person know you're busy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果有人敲门，但不是什么重要的事情，你要找个借口，让那个人知道你很忙。

sense_info_list.zh: (matter of fact)不动感情的; 据实的

examination_example.sentence: The goal keeper walked over to me and said in a <highlight>matter</highlight>-of-fact way, "In your home, do you have a moon too?"
examination_example.sentence_trans: 守门员走到我面前，一本正经地说：“在你家，你也有月亮吗？”

examination_example.sentence: As a <highlight>matter</highlight> of fact, I'm feeling a bit cold.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，我觉得有点冷。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 不超过；事关；关系到；取决于

word_level_phrase_info.phrase: a matter of life or death

sense_info_list.en: be of importance; have significance

examination_example.sentence: What <highlight>matters</highlight> is what you do, not what you know.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 重要的是你做了什么，而不是你知道什么。

examination_example.sentence: It doesn't <highlight>matter</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没关系。

examination_example.sentence: Will it <highlight>matter</highlight> if you don't take your breakfast?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你不吃早餐会有关系吗？

examination_example.sentence: No <highlight>matter</highlight> how hard things got, my mom could always joke about them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论事情变得多难，我妈妈总是可以拿它们开玩笑。

examination_example.sentence: In the school, everyone involved (卷入) in a fight will be punished, no <highlight>matter</highlight> who started it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在学校里，卷入斗殴的每一个人都会受到惩罚，不管是谁挑起的。

examination_example.sentence: Eyes make tears no <highlight>matter</highlight> how people feel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论人们的感受如何，眼睛都会流泪。

sense_info_list.en: the reason for distress or a problem

examination_example.sentence: What's the <highlight>matter</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 怎么了？

examination_example.sentence: For Mr. Twain himself, as well as the public, he needs to clear this <highlight>matter</highlight> up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对吐温先生本人以及公众而言，他需要澄清这件事。

examination_example.sentence: What's the <highlight>matter</highlight> with you?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你怎么了？

sense_info_list.en: an affair or situation under consideration

examination_example.sentence: The Greek thinker Aristotle once said, "People regard friendship as a <highlight>matter</highlight> of similarity; they say that we love those who are like our-selves."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 希腊思想家亚里士多德曾说：“人们认为友谊取决于相似点；他们说我们爱与自己相似的人。”

examination_example.sentence: Because I think promises are a <highlight>matter</highlight> of honesty.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为我认为承诺事关诚实。

examination_example.sentence: He doesn't mind the <highlight>matter</highlight> of life or death.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他不在乎生死的事。

sense_info_list.en: physical substance in the universe

examination_example.sentence: If children use screens for more than one hour a day, they might have lower levels of white <highlight>matter</highlight> in their brains.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果孩子每天使用屏幕超过一小时，他们大脑中的白质水平可能会较低。

examination_example.sentence: White <highlight>matter</highlight> is a key to the development of language and reading skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 白质是语言和阅读技能发展的关键。

examination_example.sentence: Working memory influences white and grey <highlight>matter</highlight> in the brain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 工作记忆会影响大脑中的白质和灰质。

examination_example.sentence: As a <highlight>matter</highlight> of fact, a true friend reaches for our hands and touches our hearts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，一个真正的朋友会握住我们的手，触动我们的心。

examination_example.sentence: As a <highlight>matter</highlight> of fact, change your attitude and you will change your world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，改变你的态度，你将改变你的世界。

examination_example.sentence: As a <highlight>matter</highlight> of fact, no one can win all the time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，没有人能一直赢。

examination_example.sentence: Although everything happened so fast, in a <highlight>matter</highlight> of about 4 minutes, I remember it clearly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然一切发生得太快了，但在大约四分钟的时间里，我记得清清楚楚。

word_usage.usage:
“What’s the matter?”是常见的口语表达，用于询问“怎么了”，其后可以跟with sb./sth.,用于洵问某人的病情以及某物出了什么状况。如：
—What’s the matter with Lisa?莉萨怎么了?
—She has a sore throat,她嗓子痛。

the matter指“麻烦事，困难”，在句中可用作表语或后置定语，不用作主语。
问题是车内没有位置容纳你，所以我们无法带你一起去。
误 The matter is that we won't have enough room in the car to take you with us.
正 The problem is that we won't have enough room in the car to take you with us.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指需要完成或讨论的重要事务，也指归某人管的事或某人持有某种看法的事情，也可指商事。
通常指关乎利益、命运等的紧要事务，需要考虑或处理的事。
普通用词，词义最为广泛，可指任何事实、事件、情况、行为等。
指客观上存在的、难以处理或难以理解的问题。
通常指用口头或书面提出来要求回答或有待讨论解决的问题。
含义不很具体，暗示人们考虑和关心的事和话题。
